Translations.Text: BOH zadovolʹnyayetʹsya z viruyuchamy kotrymy zastavyv virnistʹ do vas pid derevom. Vin znav shcho u yikhnikh serdenʹkakh ta, otzhe, Vin blahoslovlyav yikh z contentment, ta nahorodyv yikh z nehaynoyu peremohoyu
Dodatkovo, vony otrymani bahato psuyetʹsya. BOH ye Mohutniy, Naybilʹsh Mudryy

BOH poobitsyav vam bahato psuyetʹsya shcho vy otrymayete. Vin takym chynom prosunuti deyaki vyhody dlya vas u tse zhyttya, ta Vin withheld ruky lyudey ahresiyi proty vas, ta nadaly tse znak dlya viruyuchiv. Vin takym chynom keruye vamy u pryamomu shlyakhu
Yak dlya hrupy shcho vy ne mohly mozhlyvo zavdaty porazky, BOH popikluvavsya pro nykh; BOH Omnipotent
Yakshcho disbelievers kolysʹ borolysʹ vy, vony by povernulysya navkolo ta tikayutʹ. Vony ne mayutʹ Lorda ta Maystra; vony ne mayutʹ helper
Takyy BOZHA systema vsyudy istoriya, ta vy znaydete shcho BOZHA systema unchangeable
Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto withheld yikhni ruky ahresiyi proty vas, ta withheld vashi ruky ahresiyi proty nykh u valley Mecca, pislya Vin harantuvav vam peremohu nad nymy. BOH Seer vse vy

Tse - vony shcho disbelieved ta perehorodyly vas z Svyashchenni Masjid, ta navitʹ zavazhyly vashym proponuvannyu z dosyahayuchykh yikhnʹoho pryznachennya. Tam viryly lyudyam ta zhinkam (v mezhakh taboru voroha) komu vy ne znaly, ta vy zbyralysya zavdani bilʹ yim, unknowingly. BOH takym chynom prypuskaye u Yoho myloserdya whomever Vin wills. Yakshcho vony uperto roblyatʹ, Vin bude requite tsey sered nykh kotrykh disbelieve z bolisnym retribution

V toy chas, yak tsey khto disbelieved enraged, ta yikhni serdenʹka buly zapovneni z hordistyu dniv neznannya, BOH blahoslovlyaye Yoho kur'yera ta viruyuchiv z myrolyubnym contentment, ta napravyv yikh uphold slovo righteousness. Tse ye yaki vony dobre zasluzhyly. BOH znaye tsilkom vsi rechi
